content:
/>
V.iv.1.C.7.c
.
Coding Compensation Awards
When first establishing SC for a particular disability, include the following under each diagnosis:
percentage evaluation
effective date
period of service, and
appropriate basis for each award
INCURRED
AGGRAVATED
PRESUMPTIVE
SECONDARY
38 CFR 3.383
(PAIRED EXTREMITY), or
AGGRAVATED NSC.
Note
:  Some decision basis selections will require additional information.  For example, if the selected decision basis is SECONDARY, an associated disability must be selected from the ASSOCIATED DISABILITY drop-down menu.
Reference
:
For more information on coding compensation awards, see the
VBMS-R User Guide.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section C - Coded Conclusion
citation: Part V, Subpart iv, Chapter 1, Section C
